contextId.information: This negative statement emphasizes the positive. AT: "every one is present" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_litotes]])
This can be expressed positively. AT: "I will spare some of them who are righteous" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_litotes]] and [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
contextId.quote: I will not ruin them all
